Define the restore log rules that will be applied by the {@link restore_logs_processor} when restoring ejsapp logs.
docblock.long-description: It must return one array of {@link restore_log_rule} objects

docblock.description: Define the restore log rules that will be applied by the {@link restore_logs_processor} when restoring course logs.
docblock.long-description:
It must return one array of {@link restore_log_rule} objects

Note this rules are applied when restoring course logs by the restore final task, but are defined here at activity level. All them are rules not linked to any module instance (cmid = 0)

docblock.description: Upgrade function for the ejsapp module
This file generates the code that embeds the EJS applet into Moodle.
docblock.long-description: It is used for three different cases: 1) when only the EJSApp activity is being used, 2) when the EJSApp File Browser is used to load a state file, and 3) when the EJSApp Collab Session is used.

tag.name: copyright
tag.description: 2012 Luis de la Torre and Ruben Heradio

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://www.gnu.org/copyleft/gpl.html GNU GPL v3 or later

docblock.description: Returns the code that embeds an EJS applet into Moodle
docblock.long-description: This function returns the HTML and JavaScript code that embeds an EJS applet into Moodle It is used for three different cases: 1) when only the EJSApp activity is being used 2) when the EJSApp File Browser is used to load a state file 3) when the EJSApp Collab Session is used

tag.name: param
tag.description: record from table ejsapp

tag.name: param
tag.description: sarlab id (null if sarlab is not used)

tag.name: param
tag.description: practice id (null if sarlab is not used)

tag.name: param
tag.description: if generate_applet_embedding_code is called from block ejsapp_file_browser it is the name of the xml file that stores the state of an EJS applet, elsewhere it is null

tag.name: param
tag.description: if generate_applet_embedding_code is called from block ejsapp_collab_sessioncollaborative it is the session id, elsewhere it is null

tag.name: param
tag.description: if generate_applet_embedding_code is called from block ejsapp_collab_sessioncollaborative it is the IP of the collaborative session master user, elsewhere it is null

tag.name: param
tag.description: if generate_applet_embedding_code is called from block ejsapp_collab_sessioncollaborative it is the port of the collaborative session master user, elsewhere it is null

tag.name: param
tag.description: if generate_applet_embedding_code is called from block ejsapp_collab_sessioncollaborative it is the id of the collaborative session master user, elsewhere it is null

tag.name: return
tag.description: code that embeds an EJS applet into Moodle

docblock.description: Given an object containing all the necessary data, (defined by the form in mod_form.php) this function will create a new instance and return the id number of the new instance.

tag.description: An object from the form in mod_form.php

tag.name: return
tag.description: The id of the newly inserted ejsapp record

docblock.description: Given an object containing all the necessary data, (defined by the form in mod_form.php) this function will update an existing instance with new data.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An object from the form in mod_form.php

docblock.description: Given an ID of an instance of this module, this function will permanently delete the instance and any data that depends on it.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Id of the module instance

docblock.description: Return a small object with summary information about what a user has done with a given particular instance of this module Used for user activity reports.

tag.name: return
tag.description: = the time they did it $return->info = a short text description

docblock.description: Print a detailed representation of what a user has done with a given particular instance of this module, for user activity reports.
Given a course and a time, this module should find recent activity that has occurred in ejsapp activities and print it out.
docblock.long-description: Return true if there was output, or false is there was none.

docblock.description: Prepares the recent activity data
docblock.long-description: This callback function is supposed to populate the passed array with custom activity records. These records are then rendered into HTML via {@link newmodule_print_recent_mod_activity()}.

tag.name: param
tag.description: sequentially indexed array of objects with the 'cmid' property

tag.name: param
tag.description: the index in the $activities to use for the next record

tag.name: param
tag.description: append activity since this time

tag.name: param
tag.description: the id of the course we produce the report for

tag.name: param
tag.description: course module id

tag.name: param
tag.description: check for a particular user's activity only, defaults to 0 (all users)

tag.name: param
tag.description: check for a particular group's activity only, defaults to 0 (all groups)

tag.name: return
tag.description: adds items into $activities and increases $index

docblock.description: Prints single activity item prepared by {@see newmodule_get_recent_mod_activity()}
Function to be run periodically according to the moodle cron This function searches for things that need to be done, such as sending out mail, toggling flags etc .
Returns all other caps used in the module

tag.name: example
tag.description: return array('moodle/site:accessallgroups');

docblock.description: Must return an array of users who are participants for a given instance of ejsapp.
docblock.long-description: Must include every user involved in the instance, independient of his role (student, teacher, admin...). The returned objects must contain at least id property. See other modules as example.

tag.name: param
tag.description: ID of an instance of this module

tag.name: return
tag.description: false if no participants, array of objects otherwise

docblock.description: Is a given scale used by the instance of newmodule?
docblock.long-description: This function returns if a scale is being used by one newmodule if it has support for grading and scales. Commented code should be modified if necessary. See forum, glossary or journal modules as reference.

tag.name: param
tag.description: ID of an instance of this module

tag.name: return
tag.description: true if the scale is used by the given newmodule instance

docblock.description: Checks if scale is being used by any instance of newmodule.
docblock.long-description: This is used to find out if scale used anywhere.

tag.name: return
tag.description: true if the scale is used by any newmodule instance

docblock.description: Creates or updates grade item for the give newmodule instance

tag.name: param
tag.description: instance object with extra cmidnumber and modname property

docblock.description: Update newmodule grades in the gradebook

tag.name: param
tag.description: instance object with extra cmidnumber and modname property

tag.name: param
tag.description: update grade of specific user only, 0 means all participants

docblock.description: Returns the lists of all browsable file areas within the given module context
docblock.long-description: The file area 'intro' for the activity introduction field is added automatically by {@link file_browser::get_file_info_context_module()}

tag.name: return
tag.description: of [(string)filearea] => (string)description

docblock.description: File browsing support for ejsapp file areas

tag.name: return
tag.description: instance or null if not found

docblock.description: Serves the files from the ejsapp file areas

tag.name: param
tag.description: the course object

tag.name: param
tag.description: the course module object

tag.name: param
tag.description: the ejsapp's context

tag.name: param
tag.description: the name of the file area

tag.name: param
tag.description: extra arguments (itemid, path)

tag.name: param
tag.description: whether or not force download

tag.name: param
tag.description: additional options affecting the file serving

tag.name: return
tag.description: served file
